resources.string: To calculate the area or perimeter of a parallelogram, enter the input first!

A parallelogram is a two-dimensional flat shape which, if you look at its shape, is almost like A quadrilateral that has two parallel edges facing each other. Then, a parallelogram can also be interpreted as a side four formed by two pairs of parallel lines with angles that are not 90 degrees or not right angles.
